concept.title: AFMC PGI 5315.406-1 Pre-negotiation Objectives

conbody.p: (b)(ii) Adjudication Procedures. If significant disagreements with DCAA remain after attempts by the contracting officer and the contracting officerâ€™s local management to resolve them, the cognizant SCO will elevate to SAF/AQC as necessary and will provide an explanation of the issue to HQ AFMC/PKF via AFMC/PK Workflow .
